menu.more.title: More [code-tabs]
menu.dev.title: Developer
setting.allTabsToCode.title: Restore all code-tabs to code-block
setting.allTabsToCode.desc: Restore all code-tabs in the notebook to code-block
setting.allTabsToPlainCode.title: Split all code-tabs into standard code blocks
setting.allTabsToPlainCode.desc: Split all code-tabs in the notebook into standard code blocks
setting.activeColor.title: Active tab colors
setting.activeColor.desc: Customize active tab text and indicator color (shared)
setting.debug.title: Debug logs
setting.debug.desc: Enable debug logs and write to /data/plugins/code-tabs/debug.log
parser.headErr: Syntax error: blocks must start with :::. Example: ::: title | lang | active (lang optional, active optional)
parser.multiActive: Syntax error: only one active tab is allowed. Please remove extra active markers
parser.noLang: Syntax error: missing language after ::: (optional, can be inferred or set explicitly like js/python)
parser.noCode: Syntax error: missing code content under the title (at least one line)
msg.notAllowHtmlBlockScript: (code-tabs) please turn on: Allow execution of scripts within HTML blocks,  otherwise tabs will not be displayed properly
msg.codeStyleChange: Detected style changes, updating code-tabs theme styles
msg.copyToClipboardFailed: Copy failed: clipboard API not supported in current environment
msg.copyNeedRegenTabs: Copy failed: switch back to code block, then regenerate tabs and try again
msg.noRootId: Missing document root id. Please retry or restart SiYuan
msg.allCodeToTabsCompleted: Convert code-blocks to tabs completed, success count: {0}
msg.allCodeToTabsCompletedFailed: Convert code-blocks to tabs completed, failed count: {0}
msg.allTabsToCodeCompleted: Restore code-tabs to code-block completed, success count: {0}
msg.allTabsToCodeCompletedFailed: Restore code-tabs to code-block completed, failed count: {0}
msg.tabsToPlainCodeCompleted: Split into standard code blocks completed, success count: {0}
msg.tabsToPlainCodeFailed: Split into standard code blocks completed, failed count: {0}
msg.mergeNeedMultipleBlocks: Select at least two code blocks
msg.mergeContainsTabSyntax: Detected tab syntax blocks and expanded them before merging
